purpose: Initializes the program by accepting current date and day from system and displaying startup information.
Reads the next root segment from the IMS database and processes it if found, setting end-of-segment flag when complete.
Displays a message indicating that the file is being closed.
Inserts the parent segment into the GSAM database using IMS call and abends if the insertion fails.
Finds and processes the next child segment in the IMS database, inserting it into GSAM and marking end-of-child-segment when no more exist.
Terminates the program with return code 16 when an IMS call fails unexpectedly.
Writes the retrieved child segment data to a GSAM output file using IMS ISRT call.
Terminates the program with return code 16 when the IMS GNP call for child segment fails.
Terminates the program with return code 16 when the IMS ISRT call for parent segment insertion fails.
Terminates the program with return code 16 when the IMS ISRT call for child segment insertion fails.
